cn.domob.android.ads

类 RTSplashAd

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.domob.android.ads.RTSplashAd

  • public class RTSplashAd
extends java.lang.Object

    A class for invoking Domob real time splash ads.

    Calls and displays real time splash ads through invoking this class.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      RTSplashAd(android.app.Activity context, java.lang.String publisherID, java.lang.String placementID, SplashAd.SplashMode mode) 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void closeRTSplash()
      Remove splash view from window if your splash screen is not a SINGLE Activity.
      void setKeyword(java.lang.String keyword)
      Sets keywords available for splash ads
      void setRTSplashAdListener(RTSplashAdListener listener)
      Sets listener for splash ad
      void setRTSplashTopMargin(int topMargin)
      Set top margin of the splash view if splash mode is NOT full screen.
      void setUserBirthdayStr(java.lang.String birthday)
      Sets user's birthday information.
      void setUserGender(java.lang.String gender)
      Sets user's gender information.
      void setUserPostcode(java.lang.String pc)
      Sets user's postal code information
      void splash(android.content.Context context, android.view.View layoutView)
      Displays splash ad.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

    • 构造器详细资料

      • RTSplashAd

        public RTSplashAd(android.app.Activity context,
          java.lang.String publisherID,
          java.lang.String placementID,
          SplashAd.SplashMode mode)
        参数:
        context - context for current activity
        publisherID - publisher ID from official site of Domob
        placementID - placement ID from official site of Domob
        mode - Domob Splash Mode

        public void setUserGender(java.lang.String gender)
        Sets user's gender information.
